name: cities_search
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool city_and_state_search_api.
Tool description: A easy-to-use API for search cities, states, and countries from around the world.
API description: This endpoint allows you to search for specific cities by name. It returns a list of cities that match the specified search query.

q.description: The query string to search for cities by name.

page.description: The page number of the search results.

country_code.description: The country code to filter the search results.

sortorder.description: The order in which to sort the search results.

sortby.description: The attribute to sort the search results by.

country_name.description: The name of the country to filter the search results.

country_id.description: The ID of the country to filter the search results.

limit.description: The maximum number of search results to return.

state_code.description: The state code to filter the search results.

state_id.description: The ID of the state to filter the search results.

state_name.description: The name of the state to filter the search results.
